<<<<<<< HEAD
A students lamentation that hath sometime been in London an apprentice for the rebellious tumults lately in the citie hapning: for which fiue suffred death on Thursday the 24. of Iuly last.
[20] p.
[By E. Allde] for William Blackvvall, .., Printed at London : [1595]
With woodcut title vignette. Running title reads: An admonition to all prentises. Identified as STC 23401a on UMI microfilm. Signatures: A⁴(-A1) B-C⁴(-C4). Title page cropped at foot, with some loss of imprint (publication date from STC). Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
